channel.title: Client Hacking (Need Help!) Rep +3 << Reward
channel.description:
Ok I wanna know how to add npcs, I got the .mdl files theres 2 of them and I don't know how to put them together and make it into a npc. I know where the npc code goes, but I don't know what to do or what the code looks like, heres the pics:
[IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/BandosGuard1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i187.photobucket.com/albums/x157/gaymasteroflord/BandosGuard2.jpg[/img]
I'll be more then happy if you can help me.

item.title: Client Hacking (Need Help!) Rep +3 << Reward
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

t x:

You have to put the npc thogher tho a code just gzip them to models then create a code in class5 i.e putting them togher and your done

Uhm I know the code looks like this:

if(i == 0){ class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[9]; class5.anIntArray76 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[3]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 0xD4E7; class5.anIntArray76[1] = 0xDFC0; class5.anIntArray76[2] = 0xD3A7; class5.anIntArray70[0] = 8128; class5.anIntArray70[1] = 9126; class5.anIntArray70[2] = 8128; class5.anIntArray94[0] = ; // arms class5.anIntArray94[1] = ; // chest class5.anIntArray94[2] = ; // legs class5.anIntArray94[3] = ; // Weapon class5.anIntArray94[4] = ; // boots class5.anIntArray94[5] = ; // gloves class5.anIntArray94[6] = ; // helm class5.anIntArray94[7] = ; // cape class5.anIntArray94[8] = ; // amulet class5.anInt61 = ; // Level class5.aString65 = "NpcName"; class5.aByteArray89 = "npc examine".getBytes(); }

But I want to know how to put the two different ids together, I have gziped all the files… and I just want to make it a full Bandos Guard…

Read full topic
